types_of_data_collected: Identity and Contact Data (name, email address, phone number, indirect identifiers)
methods_of_collection: Directly from users (when signing up for an Anthropic account or to receive information on Services)
data_usage: To provide, maintain and facilitate any products and services offered to you with respect to your Anthropic account
To communicate with you, including to send you information about our Services and events
To create and administer your Anthropic account

To prevent and investigate fraud, abuse, and violations of our Usage Policy, unlawful or criminal activity, unauthorized access to or use of personal data or Anthropic systems and networks, to protect our rights and the rights of others, and to meet legal, governmental and institutional policy obligations
To investigate and resolve disputes
To investigate and resolve security issues
To enforce our Terms of Service and similar terms and agreements, including our Usage Policy
third_party_disclosure: Affiliates & corporate partners (between and among its affiliates and related entities)

Service providers & business partners (for business purposes, including website and data hosting, ensuring compliance with industry standards, research, auditing, data processing, and providing services)
As part of a significant corporate event (merger, corporate transaction, bankruptcy, or other transfer of business assets)

Pursuant to regulatory or legal requirements, safety, rights of others, and to enforce our rights or our terms (to governmental regulatory authorities, in connection with claims, disputes or litigation, for safety/fraud/credit risk, to enforce legal/contractual rights)
With an individual's consent
retention_period: As long as reasonably necessary for the purposes and criteria outlined in this Privacy Policy and explained further in their privacy center
